text: The XII Magallanes Region () is one of the fifteen regions of Chile. It has four provinces. It contains the Chilean territorial claim in Antarctica. The capital city of the region is Punta Arenas. Other towns are Puerto Natales, Porvenir and Puerto Williams. This region has the world famous Torres del Paine National Park. == Provinces of the region == * Province of Magallanes: capital Punta Arenas. * Province of Última Esperanza: capital Puerto Natales. * Province of Tierra del Fuego: capital Porvenir. * Province of Antártica Chilena: capital Puerto Williams.
title: Magallanes Region
